formElement.label: Configuration Name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the name of your RTC Defect Tracking configuration, or leave it blank to use the "default" configuration.

formElement.label: RTC Project Name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the name of the Rational Team Concert project.

formElement.label: Creation Mode:
formElement.documentation: Select Automatic if the defects should be created during job execution without user input. Select Manual to require a user to manually submit a defect from a Defect Report page linked to a Job Details page.
